This is the landing page associated with the [Warwick-Stats-Resources GitHub repo](https://github.com/Warwick-Stats-Resources).

On the [resources](resources.qmd) page, you'll find details of our projects designed to make it easier to create plots, presentations and course websites consistent with the Warwick brand.

On the [courses](courses.qmd) page, you'll find links to all the courses we've taught. 
Upcoming and in-progess courses are also listed here.
